products.title: Rimini Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Think luxurious, rich, creamy cappuccino, and you've got the feel of the rimini in coffee. This is the perfect neutral shade - soft enough to fit well amongst other, richer shades, yet distinct enough to work as a colour all by itself. Nestle amongst rich browns, pale creams, and vintage golds to really make the most of this subtle hue, which makes a beautiful, sophisticated accent for a bedroom or living room window.

products.title: Rimini Chocolate - Roller Blind
products.description: You'll be left craving the rich luxury of dark cocoa when you see the rimini in chocolate. Think cosy nights in by a warm fire, a great movie, and the family gathered round; this is the kind of atmosphere the chocolate brings to mind. Pair up with creams, golds, and beiges for a classic yet contemporary finish. This is the perfect shade for a tranquil living room; a snug, homely bedroom; or a warm, swish home office.

products.title: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind
products.description: Stockholm mocha brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm mocha brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft latte brown roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Stirlo Chocolate Brown
products.description: Stirlochocolate brown plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Unicolour Fr Taupe Brown Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for earthy, natural tones their unicolour fr taupe brown should be first choice. Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This soft brown roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and brown fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Burst Brownie Roller Blind
products.description: The dark, dulcet tones of the burst brownie are a work of art, filling the room with that warm, rich energy for which it is named. With the sun behind it, this blind will fill the room with a gorgeous yet restrained brown glow that will make you feel like you are stepping into a bath of melted milk chocolate. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Brownie Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, deep brown colour of the amor brownie is great for any room in the home. The bold, solid colour is sure to stand out no matter what the decor - and the water resistant and blackout properties makes it suitable for home and office. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Deanna Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna latte combines the signature patterning of the deanna with a rich, creamy brown we call latte. The pretty texture adds interest, while the colour is subtle and fairly neutral, and combined they offer a quality finish perfect for your home. Ideal for bringing a touch of much needed warmth to all-white conservatory or utility, this blind will look stunning combined with natural furniture and woods.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: Indulge your guests in comforting colour with the roma (fr) in latte, featuring a rich and delectable shade of brown. This lenient fabric is both crease-proof and flame-retardant, making it an elegant and modern blind with added practical benefits. Feature the latte amidst an assortment of neutral tones including cream, biscuit, and caramel hues to generate a dcor style with sumptuous and sophisticated colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Hazel - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin (blackout) hazel is a fabric that's true to its name and more than happy in any contemporary home. It's that gentle woody brown that really lifts the depth and character of a room to new heights that we love, and we know you're going to fall in love with it too. Take your time when figuring out how to work hazel into your chosen space by thinking about ways you can pair it with deep creams and sandy beiges.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many households, so feature the popular origin (blackout) in coffee in your bedroom for some well-deserved rest. This simple addition will help to shield the room against the night-time light, whilst fitting in most window spaces perfectly, and adding some brilliance to your dcor. Merge the coffee with a rich and captivating combination of cream, caramel, and cocoa hues, creating a comforting space full of warming tones.

products.title: Amor Coffee With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor coffee with haze pure double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor pure and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.
